title: Apricot almond rugelach
ingredients: ['Pastry', '125g (4¼ oz) plain flour', '125g (4¼ oz) unsalted butter, chilled', '125g (4¼ oz) cream cheese, cold', 'Filling', '250g (9 oz) apricot preserves', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '75g (3 oz) toasted and chopped almonds', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', 'Garnish', '1 egg', '5 tablespoons chopped almonds', '5 tablespoons sifted icing sugar']
